ingame_hotkeys:
macro(1, 'virar target', function()
 if not g_game.isAttacking() then return end
 local tt = g_game.getAttackingCreature()
 local tx = tt:getPosition().x
 local ty = tt:getPosition().y
 local dir = player:getDirection()
 local tdx = math.abs(tx-pos().x)
 local tdy = math.abs(ty-pos().y)
 if (tdy >= 2 and tdx >= 2) or tdx > 7 or tdy > 7 then return end 
 if tdy >= tdx then
  if ty > pos().y then
   if dir ~= 2 then
    return turn(2)
   end
  else
   if dir ~= 0 then
    return turn(0)
   end
  end
 else
  if tx > pos().x then
   if dir ~= 1 then
    return turn(1)
   end
  else
   if dir ~= 3 then
    return turn(3)
   end
  end
 end
end)

local healingSpell = 'otsutsuki regeneration'
local hpPercent = 90
macro(50, "faster healing",  function()
  if (hppercent() <= hpPercent) then
    say(healingSpell) 
  end
end)



local dash, distancia = false, 2
addIcon("SetOnOff", {item={id=10765, count=1}, switchable=true}, function(widget, enabled)
  if enabled then dash = true else dash = false end
end)

addIcon("SetDistance", {text="Dist = "..distancia, switchable=true}, function(widget, enabled)
  distancia = (distancia == 7 and 2 or distancia + 1)
  info(distancia)
end)

onKeyPress(function(keys)
    local c = {
        ['W'] = {0, -5}, ['D'] = {5, 0}, ['S'] = {0, 5}, ['A'] = {-5, 0},
        ['Up'] = {0, -5}, ['Right'] = {5, 0}, ['Down'] = {0, 5}, ['Left'] = {-5, 0},
    }
    if dash and c[keys] ~= nil then
        local posJogador = player:getPosition()
        posJogador.x = posJogador.x + c[keys][1]
        posJogador.y = posJogador.y + c[keys][2]
        local verificarPiso = g_map.getTile(posJogador)
        if verificarPiso then
            local usarDash = verificarPiso:getTopUseThing()
            if usarDash then
                g_game.use(usarDash)
            end
        end
    end
end)
UI.Separator()

macro(3000, "Buff Macro", function()
  say("Kurama Protection")
end)
macro(3000, "Buff 2 Macro", function()
  say("Baryon Mode")
end)

local chakradown1 = 'Chakra rest' -- nome da magia
local manaPercent = 80 -- porcentagem de mana
macro(2000, "Chakra rest 80", function()
if (manapercent() <= manaPercent) then 
    say(chakradown1) 
 end 
end)
ingame_hotkeys2:
local castBelowHp = 60-- % HP 
local deactiveBelowMana = 50-- % MANA
macro(99, "Chakra Defense",  function()
  if (hppercent() <= castBelowHp and manapercent() >= deactiveBelowMana and not hasManaShield()) then
    say('chakra defense')
  end
  if (manapercent() <= deactiveBelowMana and  hppercent() >= castBelowHp and hasManaShield()) then
      say('Kai')
  end
end)

macro(100, "Combo Safe Hunt",  function() -- editar nome do macro
local distancia = 15 -- distancia de verificacao
local nomeDaSpellAOE1 = "Boryoku-tekina inazuma yoko"
local nomeDaSpellAOE2 = "Boryoku-tekina inazuma yoko"
local nomeDaSpellSingle1 = "Kuroi inazuma"
local nomeDaSpellSingle2 = "Kuroi inazuma"
local playerOnScreen = fse
    if not g_game.isAttacking() then
        return

    end

    for i,mob in ipairs(getSpectators()) do
        if (getDistanceBetween(player:getPosition(), mob:getPosition())  <= distancia and mob:isPlayer()) and (player:getName() ~= mob:getName()) then
         playerOnScreen = true

 end

end

     if not playerOnScreen then 
      say(nomeDaSpellAOE1)
   elseif playerOnScreen then 
      say(nomeDaSpellSingle1)
      say(nomeDaSpellSingle2)
 
    end

 end)


macro(100, "Izanami % HP", function()   if g_game.isAttacking() and g_game.getAttackingCreature():isPlayer() and g_game.getAttackingCreature():getHealthPercent() < 60 then
        say("Izanami")  
    end 
end)
macro(100, "Tsukuyomi % HP", function()   if g_game.isAttacking() and g_game.getAttackingCreature():isPlayer() and g_game.getAttackingCreature():getHealthPercent() < 99 then
        say("Tsukuyomi no jutsu")  
    end 
end)


local revidar = false
addSwitch("revidar", "revidar", function(widget)
    revidar = not revidar
    widget:setOn(revidar)
end)

onTextMessage(function(mode, text)
  if revidar == true and not g_game.getAttackingCreature() and string.find(text, "You lose") then
    local targetName = string.sub(text, string.find(text, " [^ ]*$") + 1, #text - 1)
  local target = getPlayerByName(targetName)
if target then
  g_game.attack(target)
end
  end
end)


local summons = {
    "Karasu Bunshin",
}

local summonActive = false -- começa desativado

function isSummonOnScreen(name)
    for _, spec in ipairs(getSpectators()) do
        if not spec:isPlayer() and spec:getName() == name then
            return true
        end
    end
    return false
end

-- tecla para ligar/desligar o auto summon
onKeyPress(function(keys)
    if keys == "F1" then -- você pode trocar a tecla
        summonActive = not summonActive
        if summonActive then
            info("Auto Summons: ON")
        else
            info("Auto Summons: OFF")
            say("kai") -- fala "kai" quando desliga
        end
    end
end)

macro(100, "Auto Summons", function()
    if not summonActive then return end

    for _, name in ipairs(summons) do
        if not isSummonOnScreen(name) then
            say(name)
        end
    end
end)

Panels.AttackLeaderTarget(batTab)
addSeparator("sep", batTab)
